EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Amsterdam Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at SpringOne Tour Amsterdam!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We look forward to seeing you at SpringOne Tour Amsterdam tomorrow. Please review the event details here <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/amsterdam]]> and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Location: B. Amsterdam Johan Huizingalaan 763a, 1066 VH Amsterdam, the Netherlands
Getting There: Parking: B. Amsterdam has a parking deck right next to the venue, where they offer day tickets at a daily max of €12
Public Transport: By Tram: Line 2 Central Station – Louwesweg, stop at Slotervaartziekenhuis
By Metro: Line 50 Gein/Isolatorweg – stop at Henk Sneevlietweg By Train: Get to the station Lelylaan; then continue with Bus 64 in the direction of Amstelveen, stopping at Louwesweg/Johan Huizingalaan By Bus: Line 18 Centraal station – Louwesweg, stop at Louwesweg/Johan Huizingalaan. Line 19 station Sloterdijk – Slotervaart – Laan van Vlaanderen Line 64 station Sloterdijk – Station Lelylaan – Amstelveen, stop at Louwesweg/Johan Huizingalaan
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
